extendedInfo.description: Important: PLEASE READ THIS ENTIRE DESCRIPTION BEFORE PURCHASING!Notice: Due to recent changes in the Gmail app that prevent 3rd party apps from accessing your inbox, the LauncherPro Gmail widget is not working with version 2.3.5+ of the Gmail app. If you have version 2.3.4 or lower, the widget should continue to work fine.This app unlocks the Plus features in LauncherPro. You must have the latest version of LauncherPro (free) installed on your phone. This app will not show in your app drawer and it just acts as a license key to unlock the Plus features.After installing this, restart LauncherPro (by clicking Menu > Preferences > Restart LauncherPro) and you should now be running LauncherPro Plus. You can check this by pressing Menu > Preferences, then under LauncherPro it should say "LauncherPro Plus vX.XX"This Unlocker only works with the official LauncherPro releases. Modded/themed versions of LauncherPro will not be unlocked by this app.

reviews.title: Do your research!!!
reviews.comment: This is a very nice launcher and for the few minutes (yes I said minutes) it worked I was impressed.  Do yourself a favor and go to the developers website and read the forums.  This app is crashing and the developer has not responded to repeated request to fix the issues.
reviews.author: Les Taylor

reviews.comment: Liked it so much ive installed on both my phones ,very customisable very stable ,and simple to use,thanks devs and keep up the great work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply The Best!
reviews.comment: Tried \'em all,this is the best by a mile! Facebook widget is great & everything within the app is so customizable,it really is the best launcher for Android.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What happened? Did dev due?
reviews.comment: Was Best in market!  I have tried all the paid launchers... This is Still best launcher in market So worth the money everyone! love this on Atrix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The best launcher. Sleek and stable, cool widgets with great skins... Tried other launchers, kept coming back to lp.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Impressive. I thought I wouldn\'t want any of these bells and whistles, but it is cool and smooth. I little slower loading some items, but pimp homes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice launcher
reviews.comment: It\'s smooth and fast and light on resources (if you set it ot go light, anyway). Works great on my G2x.  Wish there were other folder display options - something that showed the contents, like ADW EX has would be awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ICS on Galaxy S III not supported
reviews.comment: Crashes on my S III all the time and is not usable.  Will wait for update until I try to use this program again.  Was good while it lasted though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: Launcher pro is cool . Fast and great fun to use. With configuration options your standard launcher may not have.
reviews.author: tom basic

reviews.title: Runs super smoothly!
reviews.comment: LP runs amazingly on my Dell XCD 35 (a.k.a ZTE blade). I tried few other launchers, but found this launcher the scrolling is super
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Been using free launcher since I had desire.paid for update for FB/Twitter widgets plus resize,etc.like having a new phone! Fast,smooth and a bargain!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Atrix 4G MB860 - Really Great Launcher!
reviews.comment: Very Stable and Feature Rich.  I really miss some of the features of GO, but it would not stabilize.  LauncherPro is rock solid and has enough features that I was willing to pay.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I Dropped My PhoneNd It Went Back To The Old Home ScreenNd I Can\'t Put Launcherpro Back UNLESS I Uninstall It. -___-
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Wouldn\'t have bought this if I knew that the developer had abandoned it last September and then just left the app on the market for profit. Useless, lacks tons of features that ADW has. Just disappointing. I wish I could get my money back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best launcher that was
reviews.comment: LauncherPro was a GREAT launcher while it still was supported...  unfortunately Federico Carnales abandoned it about two years ago (the last updated date was May 17, 2011, and this unlocker was last updated March 29, 2011).  Even without any support over the past two years, it still is considered one of the better launchers out there, and the only reason it isn\'t considered one of the best launchers is that it is starting to become a little dated.  It is small, fast, and has many great features, unfortunately as it ages it also doesn\'t have some of the great features available in the newer versions of Android.  I would love to see this launcher supported and developed again, it was ahead of it\'s time when it came out.
reviews.author: Trey Rose

reviews.title: Smooth,
reviews.comment: For Milestone 2 is best launcher. It\'s smooth and fast. It have minimal bug, with home key rotation, when is keyboard open. It take minimal RAM space for all widget and shortcut. May be it\'s time for litle update. After all the launcher pro it\'s great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Loved this app and all the features..but constantly having to force close...at least once a day...today...5 times. Droid x. May try again..later.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Um wtf i purchased and its the same thing it keeps saying i need an unlock code and i cant get a refund!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: There is a glitch with the popups, which only work in one landscape orientation. When activated in the wrong orientation, display turns upside-down.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nope
reviews.comment: The developer didn\'t abandon it smartassess, Fede is working daily at rewriting the code to improve it further, read up on his forum before you claim something like that. Also if it works as it should, why is it automatically bad because of the lack of frequent updates? Just because he hasn\'t updated it in a while doesn\'t mean it\'ll stop working as it has previously. Give him some time dammit!
reviews.author: A Google User
